business: The Courier’s Guild to deliver mail with a subdivision to handle more precarious items
characteristics: Losing an ongoing competition with House Lyrandar
Seeking to perfect teleportation with the help of House Cannith
prompts: Are you a part of House Orien? If so, do you bear the Mark of Passage? Or do you bear the Mark without being a member of the House?
If you are in the house, what is your role? What is your opinion of the House?
Where you exiled from your house?
How do you use your mark if you have one?
Do you help operate the the Lightning Rail?
How do you feel about House Lyrandar dominating the travel industry?
racePrompts: Among longer-living races, what drives you, a human with limited time in life?
Are you a part of a Dragonmarked House? Or do you just have a Mark?
What was your role and opinion in the Last War?
